title: Landing Page Content Zones Index
description: Catalog and overview of all available landing page content zone schemas

zones_catalog.title: Hero Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Primary content zone that captures attention and communicates core value proposition

zones_catalog.title: Features & Benefits Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone showcasing product features, benefits, and capabilities
zones_catalog.conversion_impact: High - builds product understanding and desire

zones_catalog.title: Social Proof Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone displaying testimonials, reviews, case studies, and trust indicators
zones_catalog.conversion_impact: High - reduces purchase anxiety and builds confidence

zones_catalog.title: Product Showcase Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone for detailed product demonstrations, screenshots, and visual presentations
zones_catalog.conversion_impact: High - helps users visualize using the product

zones_catalog.title: Conversion Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone focused on driving conversions with call-to-actions, signup forms, and purchase flows

zones_catalog.title: Education Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone providing educational content, tutorials, guides, and learning resources
zones_catalog.conversion_impact: Medium - builds trust and positions as expert, supports conversion indirectly

zones_catalog.title: Comparison Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone for competitive comparisons, feature matrices, and alternative evaluations
zones_catalog.conversion_impact: High - helps users make informed decisions in our favor

zones_catalog.title: Integration Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone showcasing integrations, APIs, partnerships, and ecosystem connections
zones_catalog.conversion_impact: Medium - shows ecosystem value and reduces integration concerns

zones_catalog.title: Community Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone for community engagement, forums, events, and user-generated content
zones_catalog.conversion_impact: Medium - builds trust through community validation and engagement

zones_catalog.title: Security & Trust Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone for security features, compliance information, certifications, and trust indicators
zones_catalog.conversion_impact: High - critical for enterprise customers and regulated industries

zones_catalog.title: Pricing & Value Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone for pricing plans, value propositions, ROI calculations, and cost-benefit information
zones_catalog.conversion_impact: Critical - directly impacts purchase decisions and revenue

zones_catalog.title: Resource Zone Content Schema
zones_catalog.description: Content zone for additional resources, downloads, documentation, support, and supplementary materials
zones_catalog.conversion_impact: Low to Medium - supports decision-making and provides ongoing value

usage_guidelines.schema_selection: Choose zone schemas based on your landing page content strategy and target audience needs
usage_guidelines.zone_ordering: Zones are typically ordered by conversion priority - critical zones (hero, conversion, pricing) should appear earlier
usage_guidelines.customization: Each zone schema can be customized by modifying the allowed section_types and block_types for your specific use case
usage_guidelines.validation: Use individual zone schemas to validate zone-specific content during development and content management

critical.description: Essential for conversion and user engagement

high.description: Important for building trust and demonstrating value

medium.description: Supportive content that builds credibility and addresses specific user needs

content_strategies.attention_grabbing: Designed to immediately capture visitor attention and communicate primary value
content_strategies.informational: Provides detailed information about features, capabilities, and benefits
content_strategies.trust_building: Builds credibility through social proof, security, and transparency
content_strategies.demonstrational: Shows the product in action through visuals and interactive content
content_strategies.conversion_focused: Optimized to drive specific user actions and conversions
content_strategies.educational: Provides learning resources and knowledge to build expertise
content_strategies.competitive_advantage: Highlights advantages over alternatives and competitors
content_strategies.value_demonstration: Quantifies and justifies the value proposition through pricing and ROI
content_strategies.supportive: Provides additional resources and support information
